Contact Us
----------

* 732-262-1044

The Brick Township Recreation Department is responsible for the coordination of recreational, sports and cultural programs for citizens throughout the year. The mission of the Brick Township Recreation Department is to improve the quality of life for all Brick Township citizens through the provision of high quality recreational facilities and a wide variety of programs that promote a healthy and enriching lifestyle and a greater sense of community while enhancing the social, cultural and physical well-being of citizens and visitors of Brick Township.
The Recreation Office is located in the Brick Township Civic Plaza, 270 Chambers Bridge Road, Brick, NJ 08723. Regular office hours are Monday through Friday, 7:30am – 4:00pm.  The Department can be reached by phone at 732-262-1044.
HOW TO REGISTER FOR PROGRAMS/ACTIVITIES
Register in-person at the Recreation Office, located in the Civic Plaza, 270 Chambers Bridge Road.  Office hours are M-F, 7:30am – 4pm. The office accepts cash, check or money order made payable to Township of Brick, or credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, Amex, Discover). Online registration is also offered for most programs and events.
You can also register online using
Community Pass
. This system is new for 2021. Any person who wishes to register online must first create an account. This includes any person who had had an account on the previous registration platform.
There is a non-refundable convenience fee of 2.9% for using credit cards online and in person. This fee is imposed by the online registration administrator, not the Township.



* Phone:
  732-262-1000
